subject: RE: [junit] Error Message when running JUnit
msgSnippet: ... The sample tests aren t in the class path. They are not part of the junit jar file. For more info search the archive - this is a *very* frequently asked
messageBody:
ichhabdieschanuzevoll wrote:
> Good Morning,
>
> perhaps you could help me with my JUnit problem:
>
> I have downloaded and unzipped the JUnit files. I have no
> problem running the software, but I alsways get the error
> message for exapmle for the file AllTests.java: "Class not
> found "junit.samples.AllTests" "
>
> can you tell me what's the problem?

The sample tests aren't in the class path. They are not part of the junit
jar file. For more info search the archive - this is a *very* frequently
asked question...

Gru√ü, Ilja
